title: Optimized Identity Verification API Features List
intro: This list represents the consolidated and refined features of identity verification APIs, derived from an analysis of 30 sites and an initial set of 191 features. The optimization process involved removing redundant, unclear, and irrelevant items to focus on the most critical and informative features that add value to the identity verification process.
resume: After careful review and optimization, the list has been streamlined to include only the most relevant features that are essential for identity verification APIs. The features are categorized to provide a clear understanding of the capabilities and services offered by these APIs.

Document Verification: Verify identity documents from more than 120 countries
Comparison of scanned passport image or entered details against official records
Detection of tampered or counterfeit passports
Automatic ID document recognition by language and country
MRZ and checksum verification for KYC
Biometric Analysis: Facial recognition technology for preventing impersonation attempts
Compliance and Security: Compliance with Know Your Customer (KYC) and Anti-Money Laundering (AML) regulations
Secure data transfer via SSL connections
Integration and Scalability: Scalability for handling large volumes of verification
Seamless integration with other platforms, websites, or apps
Cloud-based software accessible from any device
Real-Time Verification: Real-time requests to a live database
Advanced Technology: Artificial intelligence (AI) and machine learning-powered verification
AI algorithms for age verification and fraud detection
Global Coverage: Verify identity with government, bank, utility, and other data sources
Additional Services: Access to public and private records database
Comprehensive API for identity document verification
